name: DemolitionWebGL
description:
Had enough of the day? Need some escapism? Go blow up some stuff to relieve the stress but don't hurt anything or real. Place bombs in strategic places to inflict maximum damage  for high scores, choose from different bomb types and customisation. 
Almost everything in game can be blown up, it's just a matter of how you do it to get the most points.  The higher the damage the better for your score. Build you own objects/world to blow up too using the build system.  Collect random upgrades like (amongst many) large explode, health restore or many fragments to get more power.

Instructions:
Keys: W,A,S,D and mouse for movement, shift to sprint,  Mouse Scroll wheel to cycle bombs, E key to use build system (Left Mouse Button to place objects), Right Mouse Button to place bombs, for timer bombs to start count press CTRL Key, ALT Key for slomo, Esc Key for pause menu. When in game look at the top and bottom status text bars for information on bombs health.  Different types of upgrades appear in random locations in game, keep an eye out for those and pick them up quickly before they disappear.

The game is currently in Beta mode and in active development, we welcome you to test this and leave comments for improvement or suggestions.  If you would to donate that is always welcome, it helps with keeping the project going.
